title: Blu Jam Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cozy spacious cafe/restaurant located in Daikanyama, 1 minute away from the station. Mainly serves all-day brunch foods with at least 2 vegan dishes which are Mexican influenced. The vegan rancheros contains tofu, black beans, bell peppers, cilantro, chipotle sauce, salsa, avocado, vegan sour cream on top of a crispy tortilla. The spicy tofu tex mex contains tofu, black beans, onions, chipotle sauce, cilantro, potatoes, tomatoes, salsa and avocado with a side of corn tortillas. The soups are all vegan. Menu is in English with Japanese on the bottom. Seating for about 74. The interior design is industrial and earthy.
